There was a manical grin from DINOBOT then, "Rocks fall, everyMaximal=
 dies.  Come, we must complete the rest of our mission now while they are s=
uitably distracted."

Which was to secure a perimeter and then setup the se=
nsor units for reinforcements to arrive.  Now with the MAXIMALS at the near=
by ARK hopefully further distracted, they could accomplish this without fur=
ther issue then as DINOBOT's optics flickered then, signalling to the TERRO=
RCONS.

Even better, the protohumans had scattered now, so they would hvae =
